hero.description: Our online school is tailored for Egyptian students abroad, combining academic excellence with modern educational vision, all within a safe and smart environment that feels like home… and supports every home.

about.p1: Welcome to W3ey — the accredited online Egyptian school dedicated to educating Egyptian expat children, especially in the Gulf region.
about.p2: If you’re looking for modern, flexible, and secure Egyptian education that nurtures your children both academically and emotionally, W3ey is your perfect choice.
about.p3: We deliver accredited education following the Egyptian Experimental Curriculum (Languages) from Kindergarten (KG) to Middle 1, through a smart and comprehensive digital platform that blends flexibility with precision.

description.p1: We don’t just teach what’s in the books — we shape well-rounded, thoughtful individuals through free interactive clubs and exceptional enrichment subjects.
description.p2: From Science and Design Clubs to debates and educational films, we fuel curiosity and creativity in every student.
description.p3: With French, Programming, and Critical Thinking programs, we open new horizons and help build a generation that’s aware, cultured, and balanced.

items.text: I used to be afraid of speaking in class, but at W3ey, my teachers encouraged me to ask questions. Now I feel confident and happy, and I love joining the activities.
items.name: Ali

items.text: At W3ey, learning feels exciting — not stressful! I love how we can express ideas and learn creatively every day.
items.name: Sara

items.text: W3ey changed how I see school — now I look forward to every class because it’s fun and inspiring.
items.name: Omar

instructors.description: At W3ey, we carefully select our teachers — Not just for their qualifications, but for their ability to teach with heart and build trust from the very first class.

jobs.description: At W3ey, we're always looking for passionate educators who believe in modern learning and are ready to deliver exceptional online teaching experiences.

blog.description: Stay Updated with Everything W3ey. Here, you’ll find the latest from W3ey — events, articles, and updates that shape your child’s learning journey.

footer.description: Knowledge Without Borders. Education Without Limits.
